participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: She is ambitious and driven, always striving to achieve her goals and aiming for success in her career.
participant_1.background: I graduated from Yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. My parents are very wealthy bankers. I grew up in Manhattan. I plan to go to business school next year. I drive a BMW.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: He is laid-back and friendly, enjoys connecting with others, and has a great sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I'm a male. I have children and dogs. I enjoy American sports. I work in IT and have been at the same company for 15 years.

content.text: I'm doing well, thank you. Where are you from?
Oh, I live in new York city. How do you like it?
